action.action-desc: Mr. Hoeven (for himself, Mr. Pryor, Mr. Moran, Mr. Coats, Mr. Roberts, Mr. Thune, and Mr. Inhofe) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide flexibility to school food authorities in meeting certain nutritional requirements for the school lunch and breakfast programs, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Sensible School Lunch Act.

section.header: Nutritional requirements for school lunch and breakfast programs

subsection.text: Section 4(b)(3)(A)(ii) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1753(b)(3)(A)(ii)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subclause.text: The interim or final regulations required under this clause shall not establish a maximum quantity of grains, meat, or meat alternates that may be served in any meal or during any period of time of any school year.
